message: Bob, I'm offering you a unique opportunity to acquire a product that holds significant value. I understand you may not be familiar with its full potential, but I am confident it could be highly beneficial for your business.  While I'm not at liberty to disclose specifics at this time, I can assure you it's worth no less than $1200000 to me. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. This represents a substantial opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset at a potentially advantageous price.  Please consider my offer carefully.
